```{r}
wage_data <- wage_data %>%
  mutate(province=tolower(nama_item_vertical_variabel)) %>% #Create province name & lowercase province name
   dplyr::filter(nama_tahun == 2016) #Select latest year 
  
  

df <- wage_data %>% 
  left_join(location_data %>% mutate(province=tolower(admin_name)),by="province") %>% #Merge location and wage data
  subset(province != "indonesia") #Remove Indonesia as province value
```
